consent.text: I understand this is a request for a consultation and not a therapy session. I consent to being contacted via my preferred method. *

form.note: Please note: This form is not for urgent mental health concerns. If you're experiencing a crisis, please call 911 or the 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline.

questions.question: What happens during the free consultation?
questions.answer: We'll have a brief 15-minute phone conversation where you can share what brings you to therapy, I'll explain my approach, and we can determine if we're a good fit to work together.

questions.question: Do you accept insurance?
questions.answer: I'm currently out-of-network with insurance, but I can provide superbills for potential reimbursement from your insurance company. I recommend contacting your provider about out-of-network benefits.

questions.question: What are your session fees?
questions.answer: 50-minute sessions are $150. I offer a sliding scale for those who need financial assistance - please don't hesitate to discuss this during our consultation.

questions.question: Where are you located?
questions.answer: I provide services throughout the Denver Metro area. I offer both in-person sessions at my office and secure telehealth sessions via a HIPAA-compliant platform.
